name: CDSHookPatientViewContext
title: CDS Hook Specific Context for patient-view (Logical Definition)
description: This structure is defined to allow the FHIR Validator to validate a CDSHooks Patient-View context

element.short: The context for the patient-view hook
The id of the current user. Must be in the format [ResourceType]/[id].
element.definition: For this hook, the user is expected to be of type Practitioner, PractitionerRole, Patient, or RelatedPerson. Patient or RelatedPerson are appropriate when a patient or their proxy are viewing the record. For example, Practitioner/abc or Patient/123.

element.short: The FHIR Patient.id of the current patient in context
element.definition: The FHIR Patient.id of the current patient in context

element.short: The FHIR Encounter.id of the current encounter in context
element.definition: The FHIR Encounter.id of the current encounter in context
